titleStmt.title: A godlye, and pithie exhortation, made to the iud[ges of Sussex ...] By William Ouerton, Doctor of Diuinitie, and one of the Queenes Maiesties iustices appoynted for the peace vvithin the same countie
titleStmt.author: Overton, William, 1525?-1609.

titleStmt.title: A godlye, and pithie exhortation, made to the iud[ges of Sussex ...] By William Ouerton, Doctor of Diuinitie, and one of the Queenes Maiesties iustices appoynted for the peace vvithin the same countie
titleStmt.author: Overton, William, 1525?-1609.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Newbery and H. Bynneman,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A sermon preached at the assises in Sussex.
Identified as STC 18925a on UMI microfilm reel 675.
The copy catalogued has the provenance label of Sir R. Leicester Harmsworth, Bart., pasted on title page, obscuring text. Imperfect; lacks all after leaf D6.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
